statements: UPDATE BiologyGenetics SET student_name = 'John Doe', genetic_data = 'AACTTGGCC', inherited_traits = 'Brown eyes' WHERE student_id = 1;
UPDATE BiologyGenetics SET genetic_data = 'TTAGCCATG', inherited_traits = 'Blonde hair', student_name = 'Jane Smith' WHERE student_id = 2;
UPDATE BiologyGenetics SET student_name = 'Alice', inherited_traits = 'Blue eyes' WHERE student_id = 123;
UPDATE BiologyGenetics SET genetic_data = 'AACTTGC', inherited_traits = 'Brown hair' WHERE student_id = 456;
UPDATE genetic_data SET trait_type = 'Height' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE student_queries SET creation_date = '2022-07-15 10:30:00' WHERE student_id = 100;
UPDATE genetic_data SET mutation='Deletion', trait_type='Phenotype', inheritance_pattern='Recessive' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE student_queries SET query_text='How can I analyze genetic data?' WHERE creation_date<'2022-01-01' AND student_id=101;
UPDATE Students SET student_name='John Doe', birth_date='1990-05-12' WHERE student_id=1;
UPDATE GeneticData SET trait_value='Brown Hair' WHERE student_id=2 AND trait_name='Hair Color';
UPDATE Students SET student_name = 'Alice' WHERE student_id = 1;
UPDATE GeneticData SET trait_value = 'Brown hair' WHERE data_id = 3 AND student_id = 2;
UPDATE students SET year_of_study = 2 WHERE student_id = 101;
UPDATE genes SET gene_type = 'Regulator' WHERE gene_id = 201;
UPDATE students SET year_of_study = 3, major = 'Biology' WHERE student_id = 1;
UPDATE traits SET dominant_gene = 'ABC123', recessive_gene = 'XYZ789' WHERE trait_id = 5;
UPDATE Students SET student_name = 'John Doe', student_gender = 'M', student_grade = 10 WHERE student_id = 1;
UPDATE Traits SET trait_description = 'Updated Description' WHERE trait_id = 3;
UPDATE Students SET student_name = 'Alice', student_gender = 'F', student_grade = 11 WHERE student_id = 101;
UPDATE InheritedTraits SET trait_value = 'Blue eyes' WHERE student_id = 201 AND trait_id = 301;
